verses.text: PEA nau hiki mei ‘Ēlimi, pea nau a‘u, ‘a e fakataha kātoa ‘o ha‘a ‘Isileli, ki he Toafa ‘o Sini, ‘a ia ‘oku ‘i he vaha‘a ‘o ‘Ēlimi mo Sainai, ‘i hono hongofulu mā nima ‘o e ‘aho, ‘i hono ua ‘o e māhina ‘i he‘enau ‘alu atu mei ‘Isipite.
Pea na‘e lāunga ‘a e fakataha kotoa ‘o ha‘a ‘Isileli kia Mōsese mo ‘Ēlone ‘i he toafa:

pea pehē kiate kinaua ‘e ha‘a ‘Isileli, Taumaiā na‘a mau mate ‘i he nima ‘o Sihova ‘i ‘Isipite, lolotonga na‘a mau feangai mo e ngaahi kulo kakano, mo kai mā ‘o mākona; he kuo mo ‘omi kimautolu ki he toafa ni ke tāmate‘i ‘a e fu‘u fakataha ni ‘i he honge.

Pea folofola ‘a Sihova kia Mōsese, Ko eni te u faka‘uha mā ma‘amoutolu mei langi, pea ‘e ‘alu atu ‘a e kakai ‘o tufi ‘i he ‘aho ‘a e me‘a ‘o e ‘aho ko ia, koe‘uhi ke u sivi kinautolu pe te nau fou ‘i he‘eku lao pe ‘ikai.
Pea ka hoko mai hono ono ‘o e ‘aho, te nau teuteu ‘a ia te nau ha‘u mo kinautolu; pea ‘e liunga ua ia ‘i he me‘a ‘oku nau tufi ‘i he ngaahi ‘aho kehe.
Pea lea ‘a Mōsese mo ‘Ēlone ki ha‘a ‘Isileli kātoa. Te mou ‘ilo efiafi kuo ‘omi kimoutolu ‘e Sihova mei ‘Isipite:
pea te mou mamata pongipongi ki he lāngilangi ‘o Sihova, he‘ene ongo‘i ho‘omou lāunga kiate ia: he ko e hā kimaua ke mou lāunga kiate kimaua?

Pea lea ‘a Mōsese, Ko e foaki ‘e Sihova kiate kimoutolu efiafi ha kakano ke kai, mo e mā ‘apongipongi ke mou mākona, ko ‘ene fanongo ki ho‘omou lāunga ‘a ia ‘oku mou fai kiate ia; pea ko e hā kimaua? ‘Oku ‘ikai ko kimaua ‘oku mou lāunga ki ai, ka ko Sihova.
Pea lea ‘a Mōsese kia ‘Ēlone, ‘o pehē, Tala ki he fakataha kotoa ‘o ha‘a ‘Isileli ke nau ‘unu‘unu mai ki he ‘ao ‘o Sihova; he kuo ne ‘afio‘i ‘enau lāunga.
Pea ‘i he lea ‘a ‘Ēlone ki he fakataha kotoa ‘o ha‘a ‘Isileli, na‘a nau hanga ki he toafa, pea ‘iloange na‘e hā ‘a e Sikaina ‘o Sihova ‘i he ‘Ao.
Pea na‘e folofola ‘a Sihova kia Mōsese, ‘o pehē,
Kuo u ongo‘i ‘a e lāunga ‘a ha‘a ‘Isileli: lea kiate kinautolu ‘o pehē, Efiafi hifo te mou kai kakano, pea pongipongi hake te mou mākona ‘i he mā; pea te mou ‘ilo ko Sihova au ko homou ‘Otua.
Pea ‘i he hoko ‘a e efiafi, na‘e ‘alu hake ‘a e kueili, ‘o ‘ufi‘ufi ‘a e ‘apitanga; pea ‘i he pongipongi hake na‘e ai ha ‘uha hahau ki he ‘apitanga, ‘o takatakai.
Pea ‘i he ‘alu hake ‘a e ‘uha hahau, tā ko ena ‘i he toafa ha mokimoki‘i me‘a fuopotopoto, ‘o iiki hangē ko e hahau maka ‘oku ‘i he funga kelekele.

Pea ‘i he mamata ki ai ‘e ha‘a ‘Isileli na‘a nau fepehē‘aki, Ko e mana ia: he na‘e ‘ikai te nau ‘ilo pe ko e hā ia. Pea lea ‘a Mōsese kiate kinautolu, Ko ‘ena ia ‘a e mā kuo foaki ‘e Sihova ma‘amou kai.

Ko eni ‘a e me‘a kuo tu‘utu‘uni ‘e Sihova, Ke tufi mei ai takitaha ‘o fakatatau mo ‘ene kai, ko e oma ki he toko taha, ‘o fakatatau ki he lau ‘a homou kakai. Ke takitaha tufi ma‘anautolu ‘oku ‘i he tēniti.
Pea na‘e fai pehē ‘a ha‘a ‘Isileli, ‘o nau tufi; lahi ‘a e ni‘ihi, si‘i ‘a e ni‘ihi.
Pea nau fua oma, pea na‘e ‘ikai hulu atu ‘a ha‘a tufi lahi, pea ‘ikai fusimo‘omo ‘a ha‘a tufi si‘i: kuo nau tufi takitaha fe‘unga mo ‘ene kai.
Pea lea ‘a Mōsese kiate kinautolu, ‘E ‘ikai fakatoe ‘e ha taha ha me‘a ki he ‘apongipongi:
ka na‘e ‘ikai te nau tokanga kia Mōsese, pea na‘e fakatoe ‘e ha ni‘ihi ha me‘a ki he ‘apongipongi, pea na‘e ‘uangahia ia pea namua‘a: pea na‘e ‘ita ‘a Mōsese kiate kinautolu.
Pea na‘a nau tufi ia ‘i he pongipongi kotoa pē, ‘o takitaha ke fe‘unga mo ‘ene kai; pea ‘i he māfana ‘a e la‘ā na‘e ‘auhia.
Pea ‘iloange ‘i hono ono ‘o e ‘aho ko e mā na‘a nau tufi na‘e liunga ua, ko e taki oma ‘e ua ki he toko taha: pea na‘e ha‘u ‘a e hou‘eiki kotoa ‘o e kakai, ‘o nau fakahā kia Mōsese.

Pea ne pehē kiate kinautolu, Ko eni ia na‘e folofola ki ai ‘a Sihova, Ko e ‘apongipongi ko e mālōlō; ko e sāpate tapu kia Sihova: ‘ilonga ha me‘a ke ta‘o, pea ta‘o, ‘ilonga ha me‘a ke haka, pea haka; pea ‘ilonga ha me‘a ‘oku toe, tuku ke tauhi ma‘amoutolu ki he ‘apongipongi.
Pea na‘a nau tuku ia ki he ‘apongipongi, ‘o hangē ko e tu‘utu‘uni ‘a Mōsese; pea na‘e ‘ikai namua‘a, pea na‘e ‘ikai ha ‘uanga ‘i ai.
Pea pehē ‘e Mōsese, Mou kai ia he ‘aho ni, he ko e ‘aho ni ko e Sāpate ‘a Sihova; ko e ‘aho ni ‘e ‘ikai te mou ‘ilo ia ‘i he vao.
Ko e ‘aho ‘e ono te mou tufi ia; ka ‘i hono ‘aho fitu, ‘a ia ko e Sāpate, ‘e ‘ikai ‘i ai.
Pea ko eni ‘i he ‘aho Sāpate na‘e ‘alu kitua‘ā ha ni‘ihi ‘o e kakai ke tufi, ka na‘e ‘ikai te nau ‘ilo ai.
Pea folofola ‘a Sihova kia Mōsese, ‘E tuku ‘afē ho‘omou ta‘efie tauhi ‘eku ngaahi tu‘utu‘uni mo ‘eku ngaahi lao?

Vakai, he kuo ‘atu ‘e Sihova kiate kimoutolu ‘a e Sāpate; ko ia ‘oku ne foaki ia kiate kimoutolu ‘i hono ‘aho ono ‘a e mā ‘o e ‘aho ‘e ua; mou takitaha nofo ‘i hono tangutu‘anga; ‘oua ‘e ‘alu kitu‘a ha taha mei hono feitu‘u ‘i he ‘aho Sāpate.
Ko ia na‘e nofo ai ‘a e kakai ‘i he ‘aho Sāpate.
Pea na‘e fakahingoa ia ‘e he fale ‘o ‘Isileli ko e mana: pea na‘e hangē ia ko e tenga‘i kolianita, ‘o hinehina; pea ko hono ifo na‘e hangē ko e pisikete natu honi.

Pea na‘e pehē ‘e Mōsese, Ko eni ‘a e me‘a kuo tu‘utu‘uni ‘e Sihova, Fakafonu ha oma mei ai ke tauhi ki homou ngaahi to‘utangata, koe‘uhi ke nau mamata ki he me‘a ‘a ia kuo u fafanga ‘aki kimoutolu ‘i he Toafa ‘i he‘eku ‘omi kimoutolu mei ‘Isipite.
Pea lea ‘a Mōsese kia ‘Ēlone, To‘o ha ‘angame‘a ‘e taha, ‘o ‘ai ki ai ha oma kātoa ‘o e mana, ‘o tuku ‘i he ‘ao ‘o Sihova ke tauhi ki homou ngaahi to‘utangata.
Hangē ko e tu‘utu‘uni ‘a Sihova kia Mōsese, ko ia na‘e tuku ia ‘e ‘Ēlone ‘i he ‘ao ‘o e Fakamo‘oni‘anga ke tauhi.
Pea na‘e kai mana ‘e ha‘a ‘Isileli ‘i he ta‘u ‘e fāngofulu, kae‘oua ke nau a‘u ki he fonua nofo‘anga; na‘a nau kai mana ‘o a‘u ki he‘enau lava ki he tafafonua ‘o Kēnani.
Pea ko eni ko e oma ko e vahehongofulu ‘o e efa.
